content:
Hi Raymond.

You may want to pose this question in the Thunderbird Android forum: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/thunderbird-android
creator: mozilla98

content:
If you are using Windows, the following add-on might be helpful: Close to Tray (for Windows) https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/close-to-tray/

Quotation from the above link:

X moves Thunderbird to the tray, _ minimizes it. Just like Discord.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content:
Yu5tiqX9og said
If you are using Windows, the following add-on might be helpful: Close to Tray (for Windows) https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/close-to-tray/

Oh my god, this is exactly what I was looking for! I've been looking for an extension like that for years! It didn't show up on Google for me for some reason - it seems to be quite new?

Anyway, thank you!!
creator: judgement
